definition: binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: It does not tie itself to one particular transport.
sentences.chinese: 它並沒有將自己綁定在某種特定傳輸方式上。

sentences.english: We will make use of them when binding the stub to the original application.
sentences.chinese: 我們會使用這一技術來將程序段綁定到原程序。

sentences.english: Create a MulticastSocket bound to the specified socket address.
sentences.chinese: 創建一個綁定在指定套接字地址的多播套接字。

sentences.english: The import binding allows a user to specify the destination where these messages must be sent.
sentences.chinese: 導入綁定允許用戶指定必須將這些消息送到的目的地。

sentences.english: Another new option from the menu is for binding resource configuration.
sentences.chinese: 菜單中的另一個新選項用於綁定資源配置。

sentences.english: Second, we must bind the navigator content to the view.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我們必須將導航器內容綁定到視圖。

sentences.english: Each of the ports on the component will be bound to the appropriate role.
sentences.chinese: 組件上的每一個端口都將被綁定到適當的角色。

sentences.english: Xiang system systems binding characteristics of the target for everyone to use free of charge.
sentences.chinese: 系統綁定了降龍系統特色指標，免費供大家使用。

sentences.english: For a named type, the binder does not have the knowledge of the referencing element.
sentences.chinese: 對於命名類型，綁定不知道引用元素。

sentences.english: These bindings can be implicitly or explicitly defined.
sentences.chinese: 這些綁定可以通過隱式或顯式方式定義。

sentences.english: For this reason, you may only bind references to const objects.
sentences.chinese: 因此最好是將引用與靜態類型綁定。

sentences.english: Instruction calls a late-bound method on an object.
sentences.chinese: 指令對對象調用後期綁定方法。

sentences.english: It will then commit the transaction, unbind the persistence context, and close it.
sentences.chinese: 然後提交事務，取消綁定持久化上下文並關閉它。

sentences.english: In addition, these resources cannot be partitioned or bound to any one solution.
sentences.chinese: 另外，這些資源不能分區或綁定到任一解決方案。

sentences.english: Which Data Binding Should You Choose?
sentences.chinese: 應該選擇哪種數據綁定？

sentences.english: The bindings for the business process itself.
sentences.chinese: 這些綁定用於業務流程本身。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
system for identifying users (on a rail network, the Internet etc)
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
(Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
